alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued June 06 at 11:29AM EDT until June 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding. For the Rip Currents Statement, dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach County and Coastal Broward County. * WHEN...For the High Rip Current Risk, through Wednesday evening. For the Coastal Flood Statement, through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * LAKE WORTH PIER HIGH TIDE TIMES...927 AM EDT Monday, 1016 PM EDT Monday, and 1021 AM EDT Tuesday. * MIAMI HARBOR HIGH TIDE TIMES...1010 AM EDT Monday, and 1057 PM EDT Monday, and 1102 AM EDT Tuesday.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County
